Author: LikeaPandaButUgly
Text: That really sucks and I’m so sorry. I can’t trust my eyes if/how much I’ve gained or lost either.   You are right though, about recovery not being a straight line. Having urges for past behavior is so normal and feeing conflicted about recovery is too. Plus holidays are a STRUGGLE all around so it’s ok to focus on basic self care. That might mean wearing baggier clothes, distracting yourself with dumb reality tv, or allowing yourself a meal with a safer foods when you can’t manage your original meal plan

Author: Recent_Dealer
Text: I'm so sorry this is happening to you. I know the feeling all too well. Be strong and try to surround yourself with supportive people. Avoid being alone with it. Internet hugs x
